required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 27, 2015
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study of Divalproex Sodium 125 MG Delayed Release Tablets Under Fasting Conditions
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-Dose, Comparative Bioavailability Study of Two Formulations of Divalproex Sodium 125 MG Delayed Release Tablets Under Fasting Conditions

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the bioequivalence of divalproex sodium 125 MG delayed release tablets.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Bio-equivalence Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Bioequivalence according to US FDA Guidelines

arm_group.description: Divalproex Sodium 125 MG Delayed Release Tablets Sandoz
Depakote 125 MG DR Tablets Abbott Laboratories USA

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- No clinically significant findings on physical examination, medical history or laboratory tests on screening
Exclusion Criteria:
- Positive test for HIV or Hepatitis B and C
- History of sensitivity to valproic acid or related compounds

responsible_party.name_title: Eric Mitleberg. Ph.D., VP Product Development
